name: Snowy (grizzlychicken)
description:
Hello!
This is my submission to the 2021 Secret Santa Game Jam!
It's unfinished, but I'm out of time, so there we are.

Point to steer,
left-click to go,
right-click to brake

Merry Holiday,
From Grizzlychicken
